title: When they change black cleaver will they buff talon?
body:
Because he is like the only assassin that uses that item.

And with the tank meta in full swing, Yommus is just not enough

replies.body: Lots of champions benefit tremendously from the Black Cleaver. Garen, Trundle, Udyr, all ADCs, Wukong, Darius, Aatrox, and Vi among many others. It's just rare that you ever see anyone actually build it.

Garen, Wukong and Vi are the only ones that can use BC effectively.

Darius benefits way more from ghostblade then full tank since ghostblade is the only way he'll actually hit anything late game. Trundle doesn't need it more than BoRK or Triforce or LW, and he can't buy 4 offensive items. Same for Udyr and Aatrox.

You are wrong, Last whisper reduce the armor only by your attacks, Black Cleaver, cleave the enemy armor for 5 seconds, so all your teammates can be benefit and attack, so a Wukong Ult destry the armor of all enemies for 5 s, Last Whisper is instanly and don't have the "cleaved effect" so, Black Cleaver is more for utility that LW.

You are arguing stupid semantics. I know full well how black cleaver/last whisper work

That wasn't stupid semantics. He just gave you a perfectly valid argument. Compare one person stripping away 5% of the enemy's armor with each physical attack for a maximum of 25%, increasing the damage of the rest of their teammates, to ignoring 35% of the enemy's armor for whoever has that item. If you're the only AD, that's one thing, but if you're Yasuo mid, top lane is Garen, jungle is Rengar and ADC is... well, an ADC, then every single one of them would have to build last whisper to benefit from the armor penetration, compared to only buying one black cleaver. If you're building any armor penetration, it's usually because the enemy has a tank, and you're probably focusing him at that point.

Not to mention that Black Cleaver gives more damage and gives HP, flat armor penetration, and cooldown reduction, things that the Last Whisper doesn't.
